sentences.en: ...a Russian-American joint venture.
sentences.cn: …一个俄美合资的风险项目。

sentences.en: business/commercial venture
sentences.cn: 商业风投

sentences.en: children who lack the confidence to venture into libraries
sentences.cn: 缺乏自信、不敢进图书馆的儿童

sentences.en: Disney will retain a 51 percent controlling interest in the venture.
sentences.cn: 迪斯尼将保留该项目51%的控股权。

sentences.en: Grace was flushed with the success of the venture.
sentences.cn: 格雷斯为冒险成功而感到兴奋。

sentences.en: How you finance a business is critical to the success of your venture.
sentences.cn: 如何融资对企业的成功至关重要。

sentences.en: I am negotiating with financiers to raise seed capital for my latest venture.
sentences.cn: 我正在同一些金融家协商，为我最新的风险项目募集种子资金。

sentences.en: I was still uncommitted to the venture when we reached Kanpur.
sentences.cn: 我们到达坎普尔时，我仍未拿定主意是否去冒险。

sentences.en: I will venture five shillings on it.
sentences.cn: 我愿为它赌五先令.

sentences.en: I'd rather not venture out in pouring rain if I don't have to.
sentences.cn: 除非迫不得已,我才不会冒着大雨外出呢.

sentences.en: It will be sold to a joint venture created by Dow Jones and Westinghouse Broadcasting.
sentences.cn: 它将会出售给一家由道琼斯公司和西屋广播公司合资的公司。

sentences.en: Mary is unusually high on her next venture.
sentences.cn: 玛丽对下一次冒险异常热衷.

sentences.en: Nothing venture, nothing have.
sentences.cn: 不入虎穴,焉得虎子.

sentences.en: One lucky venture made his fortune.
sentences.cn: 一次幸运的机会使他发了财.

sentences.en: She paused before venturing up the steps to the door.
sentences.cn: 她犹豫了一下，大着胆子迈上台阶，走向门口。

sentences.en: Successful venture capital investment is a lot harder than it sometimes looks.
sentences.cn: 成功的风险投资有时要比它表面看起来困难得多。

sentences.en: The company has set up joint-venture pay-TV channels in Belgium, Spain, and Germany.
sentences.cn: 该公司已在比利时、西班牙和德国设立了合资付费电视频道。

sentences.en: The insecurity of the venture kept investors away.
sentences.cn: 这种冒险事业的不安全性使投资者望而却步.

sentences.en: When darkness fell, he would venture out.
sentences.cn: 天黑以后，他就会壮着胆子出去。

sentences.en: When you venture outside, you are in for a surprise.
sentences.cn: 你外出探险时，定会遇上意想不到之事。

words.tran_cn: 冒险的；危险的；好冒险的
不顾一切的；好冒险的；大胆的
放出；（通过排泄等）减轻压力

phrases.tran_cn: n. 契约式合营企业；合约式联营企业
合资协议；合营企业协议；合营协议
合资合同；联合经营合同
n. 中外合资企业；中外合资经营
风险企业（危险性高、收益大的企业）
创业投资基金；风险投资基金
风险资本市场；创业资金市场
创业公司；风险投资公司

trans.tran_en: a new business activity that involves taking risks
a new business activity that involves taking risks
a new business activity that involves taking risks
to go somewhere that could be dangerous
to go somewhere that could be dangerous

trans.tran_cn: 敢于， 大胆表示； 拿…冒险， 冒…的险
trans.tran_en: to go somewhere that could be dangerous
